ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: 'mcgibbsit' provides an implementation of Warnes & Raftery's MCGibbsit run-length diagnostic for a set of (not-necessarily independent) MCMC samplers.  It combines the estimate error-bounding approach of the Raftery and Lewis MCMC run length diagnostic with the between verses within chain approach of the Gelman and Rubin MCMC convergence diagnostic.

'mcgibbsit' provides an implementation of Warnes & Raftery's MCGibbsit run-length diagnostic for a set of (not-necessarily independent) MCMC samplers.  It combines the estimate error-bounding approach of the Raftery and Lewis MCMC run length diagnostic with the between verses within chain approach of the Gelman and Rubin MCMC convergence diagnostic.

name: r-mcgibbsit
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mcgibbsit
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mcgibbsit_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mcgibbsit/mcgibbsit_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: bc6ad411ffcda7838f8f5a8dd054a5a173c3a669fee9e3d2175cf57fca136ffa

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-coda
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-coda

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mcgibbsit')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mcgibbsit')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=mcgibbsit
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: '''mcgibbsit'' provides an implementation of Warnes & Raftery''s MCGibbsit run-length diagnostic for a set of (not-necessarily independent) MCMC samplers.  It combines the estimate error-bounding approach of the Raftery and Lewis MCMC run length diagnostic with the between verses within chain approach of the Gelman
    and Rubin MCMC convergence diagnostic.'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - izahn
